runs.comm: back of a length, angling in and cramping Smith, who squeezes it towards short midwicket
shortish ball, skids through and is onto Smith too quick to pull. Hits high up on the bat, on the sticker, and rolls to Rahane at square leg
short and wide and Smith cuts that away fiercely, rolling his wrists over and finding the gap to the left of backward point
now he bowls one on the pads and Smith clips it away to long leg

beauty. Back of a length, angling across and passing Gayle very close to off stump. Goes back and across to defend but that quickly slips past his outside edge, squaring him up. Ooh, what happened there, Snicko shows a mild deviation but no one had appealed
this one's a little wider and Gayle deliberately plays inside the line to leave it
fullish, fifth-stump line, left alone. Just a hint of away swing on that one
not short enough to pull, and it's swinging away and he has to fetch it from quite a distance outside off. Pops it up in the air, drops down safely short of mid-on
short and wide, and Smith flays at it, away from his body, leaves him and beats his outside edge
good ball, closer to off stump and a little fuller. Smith leaves it alone
back of a length outside off, dabbed away to third man
back of a length, straightens into Gayle, and he rises to his toes and defends back to the bowler
length ball, a bit of width outside off, slapped hard but too close to Rohit at cover point
back of a length, angling into middle stump, shuffles across and works that to square leg
that's painful. It's just a touch short again and again it's too quick to pull. It hurries through at an angle and smacks him in the stomach
and again he goes for a pull off a not-quite-short enough ball, and it pops off his thigh pad to the left of Dhoni
back of a length, a bit of swing in towards middle stump, tucked away to square leg
this is strange from Smith. Skips down the pitch now, looking to make room and flay that through the off side. Swings in, beats his inside edge, and bounces over the stumps through to the keeper
back of a length on middle and off, blocked into the on side

the previous one straightened a bit, this one went with the angle outside off and Gayle was in a horrendous position, to the leg side of the ball and bringing his bat down at an angle. Partly beaten, partly left alone
a little wider now, easier leave for Gayle
he's attacking that channel very well, and again Gayle withdraws his bat inside the line to make the leave

this time he's genuinely beaten. It was a little fuller, a little closer to off, and he went back and across to defend it and it left him just a touch after pitching, exaggerating the angle away from him

short now, into the ribcage, and that is excellent fielding from Rahane. Gayle rises to swat away a controlled pull and Rahane, at backward square leg, dives to his right and comes up with the ball in his hands
slides down the leg side now, back of a length. Smith looks to move across and play the glace, misses and it hits his thigh pad and rolls away towards long leg
length ball outside off, left alone
back of a length, swinging in towards middle stump and tucking Smith up for room. He doubles up and blocks it uncomfortably into the on side
back of a length on off stump, hops across and works that to the right of mid-on
gone! Too close to cut, and he stayed inside the line and poked at it with an angled bat. Came in off the pitch, and a thin but easily discernible edge through to Dhoni
banged in short outside off, Samuels drops his gloves out of the way to let it go, and it's back-to-back-to-back maidens
fullish outside off, angling away. Gayle tucks his bat behind his pad and leaves it alone
back of a length, too straight, tucked off the hips through square leg. First runs off the bat in a loooong time.
full outside off. Samuels' front foot is absolutely static, and he simply stands there and leaves it alone
once again, it's pretty full outside off, and Samuels leaves without moving his feet
looks to get this straighter, overdoes it, slides down the leg side
fullish outswinger outside off. Samuels is beaten, poking away from his body
another teasing ball in that channel, and Samuels leaves again
short and way outside off stump. Too wide for Gayle to make any contact with that flat-batted slap
down the track and Gayle has a big swing at it, across the line. Ball swings away and beats him by a light year
whoa. That's shortish, rising over middle and off, Gayle drops his bat down, inside the line, and half leaves, half plays and misses
back of a length, fifth-stump line, left alone
full, angling in, looking for the lbw ball, I guess. Overdoes it and it slips a fair way down the leg side
back of a length quite a distance outside off, left alone

dropped! Umesh moved quickly to his right from third man as Gayle swung hard at this full ball outside off. It swung away from him, and the top edge went high in the air, Umesh fell to his right, grabbed it with both hands, but it popped out when his elbows hit the ground. Good effort, and Dhoni applauds it
back of a length outside off, dabbed down to third man
middle-stump yorker as Samuels makes room to play through the off side. Digs it away towards cover

It's all happening, there's a run-out, and I'll have to take a moment to figure out exactly what all happened. It was short, and too quick for Gayle to pull from outside off. Hit high on the bat, fell short of Mohit running forward from mid-on and diving. Samuels wanted the single, Gayle was ball-watching, and both were at the batsman's end when Mohit threw to the other end. Kohli backed up quickly from cover to complete the run-out
length ball, angling across towards off stump, and Gayle hits that on the up, hits it well, up and over mid-off

Oh, man. More good fortune for Gayle. It was short and wide and he flashed hard at it, and sliced it high in the air to the left of third man. Shami put in the dive, but it landed just out of his reach
wow. That was a back of a length ball on off stump and he simply cleared his front leg and swatted that over the midwicket boundary
short ball, angled into the rib cage, pulled round to long leg
ball. That was angled in, back of a length, and straightened away from Gayle, who poked and missed
fullish on off stump, and once again Gayle clears his front leg and simply whips it away over wide mid-on
back of a length on middle and leg, tucked away through backward square leg
down the track and Gayle has an old-fashioned slog at it, going across the line, and it bounces over his edge and carries through at shoulder height to Dhoni
banged in halfway down the pitch and Gayle thinks about pulling before he drops his hands out of the way. Given wide for height, and that seems a harsh call to me
back of a length on off and middle, defended towards mid-off

short ball, and Gayle simply couldn't control that pull from outside off. Skied it way up over the leg side, and he pretty much picked out the only fielder deep on the leg side, safe catch from Mohit at deep square leg
and he's gone, first ball! That was full outside off, and he went hard at the cover drive, with an angled bat, and only managed to drag it onto his stumps, off the inside edge
full on the pads and Simmons is away with a clip through square leg
back of a length on off stump, blocked towards backward point
full and wide, pushed into the covers
back of a length on off stump, Carter defends with an angled bat towards backward point
full outside off, left alone
bouncer outside off, sways away to let it go
back of a length outside off, left alone
length ball, angling in towards leg stump. Simmons shuffles across to work it leg side, hits his pad and rolls down towards short fine leg
back of a length outside leg, worked away to the right of long leg
back of a length outside off, punched to cover
lovely line, was very close to off stump when Carter left it, but he showed there that you can leave on length on this pitch. Ball went a fair way over off stump
full outside off, driven to mid-off
full, angling in towards middle stump, pushed back to the bowler
this one hangs in the air a little longer as he comes forward to defend, dips and turns in, takes the inside edge and rolls into the leg side
flatter, pushed through full outside off, presses forward to block
a little slower, closer to off stump, defended with soft hands into the off side
tossed up a bit higher and he gets to the pitch to drive to long-off
back of a length, straightening towards off stump, punched to mid-on. Not sure if that was the outswinging arm ball or the carrom ball
shortish, goes for the pull and it pops off the thigh pad into the forearm, and down into the ground on the on side
back of a length outside off, defended to point
back of a length outside off, and that's a good shot from Carter, goes across, rises on his toes to ride the bounce, and punches it away to the left of point
fullish outside off, left alone
back of a length on middle and leg, clipped away towards deep square leg
back of a length outside off, and Rohit slides to his left from cover point to stop that backfoot push from Simmons
lovely ball, dangled up above the eyeline and dipping outside off. Goes for the drive, doesn't get to the pitch. Turns away to beat his outside edge
tossed up wide outside off, swept down to deep square leg
tossed up, angling in towards off and middle, defended back towards the bowler
shortish, too much bounce to cut safely, chops it down towards backward point
ball! That was the swinging arm ball. Carter backed away to cut and it came into him and smacked him on the pad. Height saved him there
tossed up much slower outside off and he stretches out to sweep. Can't connect, hit on the thigh pad
back of a length outside off, pushed to the right of cover for a rare quick single
fullish, a bit of swing away from off stump, good leave
good ball, angling away, not full enough to drive. Goes hard at it with an angled bat and he's lucky he didn't edge that
back of a length on off stump, shuffles across to defend towards mid-on
full and wide and he reaches out to slice it away in the air, bounces down to the left of third man
back of a length, a bit of swing in towards middle stump, Simmons knocks it down softly towards mid-on for a quick single
nice flight, turns in from off to middle, comes forward to defend, squirts it off the inside half of the bat into the on side
length ball, goes with the angle towards middle stump as Carter jams his bat down to defend. Off the inside edge through square leg
length ball outside off, comes forward to poke it away towards point
tossed up on middle stump, clipped away to the right of midwicket

shot! It's not an easy pitch to sweep on, and he gave that plenty of flight outside off, but he got really low, stretched fully forward, and rolled his wrists over to get on top of the bounce and hit it firmly to the deep square leg boundary
quicker and flatter on off stump, defended into the covers
back of a length outside off, left alone
back of a length, angling in towards off stump, jumps across to defend towards mid-off
a little wider outside off and Simmons allows it through to the keeper
short ball, shapes to pull, decides against it in the end, drops his hands and his head to let it pass over him
back of alength outside off, defended towards cover point
another ball in that tight channel outside off, Simmons jumps back and across to defend to short extra cover
tossed up, angling in towards middle stump, clipped down to long-on
nice flight again, dips as Simmons pushes out to defend, and spins and bounces into him. Thrusts his pad forward to kick it away
shortish outside off, slapped to backward point
down the track now, Ashwin bowls it at his feet, clipped away to deep midwicket
short and wide, that was there to cut, but he didn't quite control it, and he chops it down finer than he intended, wide of Raina at slip
tossed up higher outside off, stretches out to leave it alone
another wicket off a short ball. It's banged in outside off, and Simmons is really in no position to hook it. Top-edges it and Umesh takes a simple catch at long leg
short ball angled across Carter, left alone
length ball outside off, left alone
fullish on middle and leg, clipped to mid-on
excellent delivery, length ball centimeters outside off, and Carter trusts the bounce to leave it, even though it straightened in towards him
now he slants it fuller and wider and Carter has a swing and a miss with an angled bat, was looking to crack that through the covers
fullish on off stump, drives with an open face to cover point
tossed up a shade outside off, pushes forward to block
stays straighter than Sammy expected and he has to prod at the length ball outside off with the open face to collect a single to third man
a bit of bounce off the WACA pitch for Ashwin, as Sammy shoulders arms and is hit above his stomach
leans forward and pushes the flighted ball in front of point
goes back to a flatter, length ball and taps to deep cover
slower through the air as he bowls around to the left-hander, who comes forward to block
dug in short and a shade outside off, Sammy isn't interested
fuller delivery in the off-stump corridor, Sammy shuffles across and leaves
134kph, directs his bouncer over middle and makes Sammy duck under it
another short ball right over off stump and Sammy evades it
back of a length on off stump, knocked down to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, Sammy lets it through
back of a length, goes with the angle towards off stump, back and across to defend
goes for that sweep again, from outside off. It's slower than he expects and he's beaten, through the shot too quick
no real room to cut, chopped down to backward point
he didn't seem to read that. Was playing inside the line, maybe expecting the straighter one, and it turned and beat his outside edge

aaand he's gone. The sweep does him in. On this pitch, one ball is going to bounce a bit more, especially when Ashwin's flighting the ball this well. Top-edges it, and Shami came in a little too far from the long leg boundary, but he kept his eyes on the ball and stretched to his right, over his head, and backwards, to catch it in both hands
fired in quicker and flatter as Sammy walked across his stumps, ended up sliding down the leg side
back of a length, turns in towards off stump as Sammy made room, cuts it straight to backward point
short ball outside off, too much bounce to play a safe shot at, Russell leaves it alone
short outside off and Russell clears his front leg and swats that over the ropes at cow corner. That was hit extremely hard
another bouncer, this one's straighter and Russell ducks under it
slower ball, full outside off. Russell had made room to hit over the off side, and it was too far away to connect, swings and misses
full outside off, driven firmly to the left of mid-off, where Rohit makes a good diving stop
fullish, gets a bit of inswing, ends up swinging down the leg side
another bouncer, Russell ducks low under it
short outside off, pulled in the air, into the gap between mid-on running to his right and deep midwicket running to his left

dropped! That was extremely poor from Sammy, going after another short ball that wasn't really there to be pulled, and it hits high on the bat and goes high in the air, drops into the hands of Jadeja at point and simply falls through them. Didn't time the closing of his fingers
tossed up outside off, blocked back to Ashwin
fullish outside off, presses forward to defend, off the inside half of the bat through square leg
there's the arm ball outside off. Sammy presses forward to block into the covers
tossed up a little slower and he squeezes that defensive shot into the covers, bat very close to pad
back of a length outside off, poked away to backward point
aaand he strikes first ball. Sees a bit of air outside off and Russell goes for a big hit straightaway, hits across the the line, and top-edges a loopy catch to Kohli coming in from long-off.
full, angling in towards off stump, poked back towards the bowler
a bit of air outside off, comes forward to steer it away to the left of sweeper cover
tossed up outside off, comes forward and dabs it towards short third man
flighted outside off, swiped down to long-on
again some loop outside off, presses forward to defend towards point
lovely flight, dips and turns sharply as Sammy stretches out to defend, hits him on the front pad
goes deep in his crease now, defends towards mid-on
loopy outside off, Sammy presses out to block it back to the bowler
straighter one on middle stump. Goes on the back foot to clip towards short midwicket
back of a length, a bit of width outside off, Sammy slaps it away, in the air but wide of Shami at backward point. Didn't make the greatest effort to stop the ball
length ball turning in towards off stump. Stays on the back foot to poke it away to the left of cover
tossed up outside off, stretches out to defend towards extra cover
full on leg stump, clipped to short midwicket
slow, flighted ball outside off, sharp turn away as Sammy leaves
again some flight outside off, pushed down the ground to long-off, was in the air for a bit
tossed up outside off, steered away to the left of sweeper cover
full on middle stump, driven down to long-on
back of a length outside off, left alone
back of a length, angling into leg stump. Goes back and across to tuck it into the leg side, hits his thigh pad and rolls away backward of square
short and wide, Holder goes hard at it with no footwork, slashes and misses
having bowled the previous one short and wide outside leg, he overcompensates and bowls it full down the leg side
full on a fourth-stump line, left alone
back of a length close to off stump, straightens away to beat his defensive poke
full and wide, driven to cover point, where Dhawan dives to his left to stop the ball
back of a length outside off, steered to third man with an open face
back of a length outside off, defended to short extra cover
length ball on off stump, defended to short midwicket
full on middle stump, punched back to the bowler
dangled up outside off, pushed to cover point
full on middle stump, whipped to short midwicket
tossed up wide outside off, driven to sweeper cover
traps Holder on the crease with this incoming ball, hits him on the pad as he misses an across-the-line whip, but it's going to be very very hard to get lbws with the bounce on this pitch
fuller now, clipped to short midwicket
back of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to deep point
length ball on middle and off, defended to mid-on
bouncer, Sammy bends at the waist to get under it
length ball, angling in towards off stump, pushed into the off side with soft hands, take the single easily by the time the cover fielder moves in
short ball angling into the body, swatted down to long leg
tossed up on off stump, defended to short extra cover
fired in full, gets his line wrong, angles down the leg side
a bit of flight on off stump, defended down the ground to the left of the bowler
a bit of flight again and he skips down the track to drive to long-off
flighted ball angled into off stump, presses forward to defend
dangles this wide of off stump, Sammy ignores the invitation to drive
full on off stump and he pops it in the air as he looks to clip it into the on side. Goes over the leaping Jadeja, who can't reach it with his outstretched arm
back of a length outside off, defended towards point
full on middle stump and he shuffles across to clip it away elegantly to the wide long-on boundary
back of a length outside off, dabbed to the left of short cover for a quick single
shortish outside off, punched firmly to deep point
full on off stump, punched to mid-off
length ball outside off, pushed towards point with an open face
full on leg stump, clipped down to long-on
goes back to a length ball on middle stump, defends towards short midwicket
tossed up on off stump, driven to long-off
length ball on off stump, defended to short extra cover
quicker and flatter on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
a bit slower and it goes with the arm as he presses forward to defend. Off the inside half of the bat into the leg side
length ball outside off, steered to backward point
short, rising ball over off stump. Holder goes for the pull, bounces over his top edge
back of a length outside off, dabbed towards point
slower ball outside off, steered towards sweeper cover
back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
back of a length, fourth-stump line, defended to short extra cover

run-out appeal, and they've gone to the third umpire. Holder tucked it into the leg side, close to the short midwicket fielder. Sammy wanted the single, he was sent back, and Dhawan quickly swooped to his right, picked up, and turned to throw to the bowler's end. Sammy dived into his crease and made it just in time. The threw rolled off his bat towards the bowler, but he didn't get in the way intentionally
quickish on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
a little slower and wider, pushed into the covers
tossed up on off stump, driven down to long-off
back of a length outside off, punched to cover point
slower bouncer outside off, bounces a second time down to Dhoni after Sammy leaves it
full outside off, goes hard at it with an angled bat and inside-edges it past his stumps, down to the fine leg boundary

gone! That's a back of a length ball, angling in towards Sammy from wide of the crease. The batsman was looking to make room to play through the off side and it followed him, and he had to poke at it with his feet in the air, and ended up nicking it to the keeper, off the shoulder of the bat
short and wide, too much bounce and too far away for Taylor to connect with that slash
back of a length close to off stump, punched towards backward point
shortish ball outside off, Taylor thinks about playing it and withdraws his bat inside the line at the last moment
tossed up outside off, driven to cover point
back of a length on off and middle, blocked back to the bowler
sweet! Down the track, gets inside the line, and swings cleanly through the line to hit it over the bowler, to the right of long-off, clears the rope comfortably
and Jadeja responds with a bit more flight, pulls his length back a bit. Holder swings across the line, misses
full on off stump, driven inside-out to the left of long-off
a bit of loop outside off, presses forward to poke it to the left of extra cover
banged in short outside off, left alone
full outside off, driven to extra cover
short ball on off stump, and he clears his front leg to club it away to the straight midwicket boundary. Got on top of the bounce and rolled his wrists over the ball

length ball on off stump, and for a moment it looked like he got more elevation than distance, but he easily cleared the rope. Cleared his front leg again, and swung his arms through a pretty straight line, straight back over the bowler's head
shortish outside off, gets on top of the bounce and knocks it down to third man
bouncer outside off, too high for Taylor to pull. Shapes for the shot and decides to leave in the end
short ball on middle stump, pulled away towards deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, Taylor leaves it alone
back of a length outside off. Too close to cut, bounces over Taylor's bat
back of a length outside off. This time he made a bit of room and cut it away very well, up and over to the left of backward point
banged in short, down the leg side. Taylor can't connect with the hook
length ball on off stump, makes room and looks to club it hard down the ground. Doesn't quite middle it, rolls down to mid-off
back of a length outside off, left alone
down the track, gets inside the line, and that is beautifully played, lofted inside-out over extra cover, and it sails 15 rows back. Approximately.
full and flat on leg stump, driven down to long-on
back of a length outside off, punched away to the right of backward point
flat, angling into middle and leg, gets the front leg out of the way to push that wide of cover
back of a length on off stump, dabbed away to the left of short third man
flat on leg stump, clipped in the air, wide of short midwicket, down to long-on
back of a length on off stump, defended watchfully towards extra cover
length ball, follows Taylor as he backs away to make room. Shovels it with a lot of bottom hand, just clears Raina, who gets a fingertip to it with an outstretched arm
length ball outside off, makes room to slap through the off side, can't connect
shortish, angling down leg, pulled round to long leg

slower ball on off and middle, and Rohit Sharma drops a dolly. Taylor clears his front leg to go over the top, hits it high in the air, to the right of Rohit at short midwicket. He got under it, and the ball simply popped out of his grasp
back of a length outside off, chopped to the left of backward point, where Jadeja makes an excellent diving stop
back of a length on off stump, defended to short extra cover
a replay of the previous ball, this time he played it to the right of the fielder rather than to his left
tossed up on off stump and he stretches out to lap it away towards fine leg
again some flight and he swipes it in the air to the right of long-on
round-arm, flat, angling into off stump, defended towards backward point
length ball outside off, whipped down to long-on
shortish, not short enough to pull, hurries through and smacks Holder on the back thigh
back of a length on off stump, goes back and across to tuck it away wide of mid-on and bring up his half-century. Such a good innings this has been from the West Indies captain
back of a length on off stump, poked down to mid-on
shortish on middle stump, swivels to play a controlled short-arm pull to deep midwicket
full-toss on leg stump. Holder backs away from his stumps and flat-bats it to the right of Rahane at sweeper cover
bouncer outside off, goes for the hook, top-edges it, and this time he pops it in the air, and Umesh moves to his right from his follow-through and takes a simple catch
back of a length on off and middle, defended towards extra cover
length ball on off stump, pushed down the ground to long-on
ducks into a bouncer on middle stump, and it bounces off the side of his helmet towards third man
slower ball on off and middle and Holder has to wait and wait to open his face and dab it to short third man
makes room and that is a terrific shot. It was a middle-stump yorker and he stabbed it away to the vacant backward point boundary
slower ball on off stump, clubbed down to long-on to retain the strike
pushed through on off stump, Holder keeps it out
oh, he's holed out! It was a good length ball and as the batsmen before him, he tried to make too much of it. Poor heave ends up as a slice that the long-off fielder has no trouble with
